attributes.name: Index Meta-Database
attributes.description: Index for Materials Cloud databases exposing an OPTIMADE API.

attributes.description: List of OPTIMADE API providers by Materials-Consortia, pointing to materials database providers.

attributes.name: 2D Structures
attributes.description: Two-dimensional (2D) materials from high-throughput computational exfoliation of experimentally known compounds.

attributes.name: OPTIMADE Sample Database
attributes.description: Database with example structures for OPTIMADE tests.

attributes.name: AiiDA
attributes.description: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science (AiiDA)

attributes.name: Example provider
attributes.description: Provider used for examples, not to be assigned to a real database

provider.name: Materials Cloud
provider.description: A platform for Open Science built for seamless sharing of resources in computational materials science
